TopicTitle: KSP has a place in xkcd creator's heart.

Articles.Content:
http://xkcd.com/1106/

I smiled when I saw the "alt text" of the image. Didn't anyone else here notice? Am I the only one who follows XKCD comic?
I was just about to come over here and post this! So incredibly funny, because that is approximately the same monologue going through my head at any given time too.

http://xkcd.com/1106/

I smiled when I saw the "alt text" of the image. Didn't anyone else here notice? Am I the only one who follows XKCD comic?

There is another thread.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/19957-XKCD-Mentions-KSP

I know my son and I geek'd out when we saw the alt text. Now we need to get Freefall to mention KSP.
